name: Cube Robots... in Space!!!
description:
You're a cube robot, in space!!! Complete each level by clearing all the tiles, but you'll have to be careful. The two platforms are, wait for it, joined together, so you will have to think ahead before you move. Enjoy!

Pixel art, sound effects, and coding by me. Programmed in the Godot engine.
